Title: With the great support of the Soviet Union, and our own greatest strength, we will realize the industrialization of our nation step by step!
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: The Chinese is holding the 'Five Year Development Plan for the People's Republic of China', the Russian the 'Plan for Developing and Redesigning 141 Factories for China'.
Theme: Foreign Friends: Soviet UnionFirst Five Year Plan (1953-1957)
